item.title: The traffic light outside Home House 20 Portman Square has been damged by the buses. The lights covers are hanging dangerously and it needs to be fixed. It has been damaged since this morning and the wires are exposed now, 30th July
item.description:
The traffic light outside Home House 20 Portman Square has been damged by the buses. The lights covers are hanging dangerously and it needs to be fixed. It has been damaged since this morning and the wires are exposed now

item.title: 46 Wilton Way Leaves Trash Out all Week, 30th July
item.description:
The residents of 46 Wilton way consistently leave their trash bags on the sidewalk several days before collection day. Foxes open them and leave trash everywhere.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wilton Way, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox in box., 30th July
item.description:
Dead fox in box has been dumped outside of Church. The smell is awful. this has already been reported and there was an update to say it had been resolved but the fox it still here. Please remove asap
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Northchurch Terrace, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned fridge and shelving, 30th July
item.description:

item.title: Pavement obstruction due to tree stumps new growth, 30th July
item.description:
The council cut these trees down a number of years back. The reason given on the removal notice was due to tree routes damaging property. The tree stumps that were left in place are causing a new problem as the new growth on the stumps is not being managed and is causing an obstruction on the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 50, Jasper Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temporary highway works sign from 2018 needs removing, 30th July
item.description:
The previous Fixmystreet request 4900076 raised in August 2023 was never actioned by Southwark Council. May you action this request as a priority please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Jasper Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging prickly bushes on pavement, 30th July
item.description:
Overgrown weeds on pavement for at least 3 months and only half of Goodwood road is swept as no one comes to clean the dead end of the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 40, Goodwood Road, New Cross Gate, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Former tree pit deteriorating in condition as no new tree planted., 30th July
item.description:
A diseased horse chestnut tree was removed about two years ago and the Council stated that a replacement tree would be planted in the next season. However, whereas other trees have been planted since in St. James's Avenue, no tree has yet been planted and, as a result, the pit in the pavement has continued to deteriorate. Could you please let me know when a tree will be planted and the ground made good?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St James's Avenue, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: CHILD Playground broken glass , overflowing litter bin, 30th July
item.description:
Dangerous broken glass in large pieces on path uphill to upper sandpit area. Plus litter overflowing in bin in Lower playground. Please action very promptly. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tetty Way, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet
